summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 25344, creating Local Improvement District No. 2405, entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 37th Avenue South all in the City of Seattle, from the north line of Rainier View Addition to Thistle Street, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2786, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of \`Payment in Bonds', as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved October 13, 1910 and published October 19. 1910.
